You are using AI all wrong.

✖ Your prompt: "How can I do [X]?"

☑ My prompt: "After reading all of [trusted sources like PDFs, videos, websites...], how to do [X]?"

Here's a step-by-step guide to getting there.

-- FROM MY VIDEO ---

1. Go to notebooklm.google.com.
2. Create a free account with Google.
3. Upload your sources (PDFs, YouTube...)
4. Click on "Discover" & ask for more sources.
5. Then prompt the chat in the middle like ChatGPT.

-- ALTERNATIVE, with CHATGPT ---

I explain how on my blog "Learn anything", and much more, here: https://lnkd.in/dcU3kNxJ.

You learn something? Repost ♻️ for your network.
